info.title: Swagger docs for Appo Beauty API
info.description:
This is a Appo Beauty Server based on the OpenAPI 3.0 specification.

 Ⓒ Kateryna Koltsova 2023. All rights reserved. 

Some useful links:
- [The API repository](https://github.com/KateKoltsova/Appo)
- [The API server](https://appobeauty-6ecbc596ee8d.herokuapp.com/api)

post.description: Send request with all user parameters to create new user

parameters.name: phone_number
parameters.description: The user phone number for login

example.message: The email field must be a valid email address. (and 2 more errors)

errors.email: The email field must be a valid email address
phone_number: The phone number field must be at least 13 characters
The phone number field format is invalid

post.summary: Get user token for log in
post.description: After user fill form, you may send request with user data to this route for getting access token and use that with next requests

example.message: These credentials do not match our records

errors.email: These credentials do not match our records

post.description: You may send refresh token to this route for get new pair access-refresh tokens, when access token is expired or another reason to update access token

parameters.name: refresh token
parameters.description: The refresh token for get new access token

post.summary: Send to user email link for change password
post.description: When you send request to this route, the user with receives an email with a link to change the password, the URL that you specify in the request is used to generating the link

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL to use for creating link for change password mail

200.description: OK (временно отдаю токен, мне нужен для теста)

post.description: When you send request to this route, the user with receives an email with a link to change the password, the URL that you specify in the request is used to generating the link

example.message: Password for user email@email.com successfully changed
User successfully logout from all devices

get.description: Send request to get full list of users

get.summary: Find user by ID (only own data)
get.description: Returns a specified user by ID

parameters.name: phone_number
parameters.description: The user phone number for login

example.message: The lastname field must only contain letters

errors.lastname: The lastname field must only contain letters

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The id that needs to be deleted

get.summary: Get list of prices specified master (only master)
get.description: Send request to get full list of prices specified master

post.summary: Create new price specified master (only master)
post.description: Send request to get full list of prices specified master

get.description: Returns a specified master price by ID

example.message: The price field must only contain numbers

get.summary: Get list of schedules specified master (only master)
get.description: Send request to get full list of schedules specified master

post.description: Send request to create schedule specified master

get.description: Returns a specified master schedule by ID

delete.summary: Delete appointment on specified schedule (only master)

example.message: Appointment on this schedule successfully deleted

get.summary: Get list of appointments specified user
get.description: Send request to get full list of appointments specified user
Returns a specified user appointment by ID

get.summary: Get list of services for drop down list
get.description: You can get full list of services

get.summary: Get list of cart items specified user (only auth)
get.description: Send request to get full list of cart items specified user

post.summary: Add item to the cart specified user (only auth)
post.description: Send request to add item to the cart items specified user

message.example: You already have the same date-time in the cart

delete.summary: Delete cart item specified user (only auth)
delete.description: Deleted cart item specified user cart item

get.description: Send request to block cart items by specified user and chose way to pay

get.summary: Get button for pay order by liqpay (only auth)

html_button.example:
<form method="POST" action="https://www.liqpay.ua/api/3/checkout" accept-charset="utf-8">
<input type="hidden" name="data" value="" />
<input type="hidden" name="signature" value="+Vm0kWxHu/ezU2qufuH0mXLo+f4=" />
<input type="image" src="//static.liqpay.ua/buttons/p1ru.radius.png" name="btn_text" />
</form>

get.summary: Get list of available schedules (all users)
get.description: Send request to get full list of available schedules
